casebody.data:
No. 58,

Misc.

Nash, on behalf of Hashimoto et al., v. MacArthur, General of the Army, et al. .Simon J. Nash for petitioner. Solicitor General Perlman, Assistant Attorney General Mclnerney and Beatrice Rosenberg for respondents.

United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit. Certiorari denied.
